title: 'Not even the darkest cells of Evin have silenced her': Nobel laureate speaks out from jail | CNN
text: Video Ad Feedback 'Not even the darkest cells of Evin have silenced her': Nobel laureate speaks out from jail Imprisoned Iranian Nobel laureate Narges Mohammadi is asking the UN to deem gender apartheid a crime, just as she goes on hunger strike with other detainees over the execution of protester Mohammad Ghobadlou. Correspondent Jomana Karadsheh has the latest. 07:58 - Source: [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/) Stories worth watching 16 videos Video Ad Feedback 'Not even the darkest cells of Evin have silenced her': Nobel laureate speaks out from jail 07:58 Now playing- Source: [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/) Video Ad Feedback Video appears to show North Korean teens being punished in front of crowd.
